Package xxl.applications.indexStructures

This package contains applications and use cases of XXL's indexstructure framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BTreeExample Example code concerning the creation and reopening of B+-Trees.
BTreeExample.Data A simple example class for a data object.
BTreeExample.Key An example class for a key element for BTreeExample.Data.
BTreeTest Creates and tests a BTree with minimum (maximum) capacity given by the command line argument 1 (2) by inserting the numbers of a permutation of the numbers ranging from 0 (inclusive) to the value of command line argument 3 (exclusive).
Common Class that contains common functionality for the indexstructures examples.
IndexTests  
IndexTests.BlockCounter Helper class for counting the number of block accesses.
IndexTests.TestDataElement A class to represent data elements for testing purposes.
IndexTests.TestDataHelper  
MTreeReopenTest This class tests the reopening of an MTree stored on external memory.
MTreeTest Creates a flexible, disk resident M-Tree or Slim-Tree and performs exact match, range and nearest neighbor queries on it.
MultiDiskBTreeTest Class for testing the MultiDiskBTree.
RTreeTest Creates a flexible, disk resident R*-Tree, linear R-Tree, quadratic R-Tree, Greenes R-Tree or X-Tree and performs exact match and range queries on it.
ShowKPERectanglesCursor This cursor draws the rectangles that are includes in the KPEs of the used iterator.
Tests This class provides several static methods which are useful for for preparing tests of indexstructures.
Tests.Employee A class to represent the data objects which are stored in an index structure.
 

Package xxl.applications.indexStructures Description

This package contains applications and use cases of XXL's indexstructure framework.

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.
Send an email to xxl-request@lists.uni-marburg.de without subject and the word \"subscribe\" in the message body.

Questions or Bugs? Send us an Email: request@xxl-library.de
